text: Marcella Nunez-Smith is an American physician. She is an associate professor of medicine and epidemiology at the Yale School of Medicine, where she is also Associate Dean for Health Equity Research and founding director of the Equity Research and Innovation Center. In November 2020, Nunez-Smith was named as one of three co-chairs of Joe Biden's COVID-19 Advisory Board. ==References== Category:Living people Category:American physicians Category:Yale University faculty Category:Epidemiologists Category:1970s births
title: Marcella Nunez-Smith
